name: Protectio
description:
A middle-aged man lives alone in his forest cabin after the tragic death of his wife and daughter. When an evil ancient forest creature awakens and attacks the house with its vassals, the man swears that he will protect his home and the memory of his family whatever it takes.

CONTROLS

There are 2 levels in game. 

First level is a top-down section. Controls:

W, A, S, D — movement

MOUSE — aim, shoot

1, 2 — switch weapon

R — reload

Second level is a first-person section. Controls:

A, D — movement

MOUSE — aim, shoot

CREDITS
